sentences.sContent: I'll toss you for who pays the bill.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'll toss you for who pays the bill.
sentences.sCn: 我和你掷钱币决定谁来付账。

sentences.sContent: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.sCn: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

synos.tran: 投掷；摇荡；投掷的距离；掷币赌胜负
投掷；使…不安；突然抬起；使…上下摇动；与…掷币打赌
辗转；被乱扔；颠簸；掷钱币决定某事

phrases.pCn: 辗转反侧；翻来覆去难以入睡
对(决定)提出异议(或辩论)；争论已决定的事，作无谓的争执
抛硬币决定问题；掷硬币猜正反面的赌博
掷钱币决胜负；匆匆准备

trans.tranOther: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand
